news: Welcome to our new feature! Stay tuned for regular updates and exciting news about our radio community.

Dear Testers :) Please check for an update in the google playstore or thru this link : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.einstein.dmr_database_app&hl=en-US :) If you need to test it on a none playstore device the apk can be downloaded here : https://api.einstein.amsterdam/webapp/com.einstein.dmr-database-app.apk and for mac here : https://api.einstein.amsterdam/webapp/dmr-app-dmg.zip :) Password on request. web version : https://dmr-database.github.io/dmr-database-app/
Show picture from qrz (if present) on detail view (work in progress, testpage works but backbutton is broken)
Hamvoip does not import 13 users :(
A Special thank you to all the testers, we are getting there :)
Lazy Search, search for callsign show all entrys from all databases viaversa by PH4T *will try to implement before official release*

header: Search with * not possible yet use % instead
news: instead of * use % f.e. %2emc or just % to search all use it as if it was a *, will fix in software to change * to %
Foxhunt almost finished :) 8/10 done (technical only fox 9 needs to be done to be a winner) Happy Hunting :) check the contact page for a paw to start hunting
fixed the keyboard staying on top after search, when pressing search it will disapeer
Implement auto,day/night and color modus, this already works in the dev version and needs to be implemented into test version. This will be in 1.1.xx ?
Button and links to extern not working in android 14 (redmi)

header: Update button doesn't update on android
news: works on ios and macos but not on android

header: Beta Release (1.0.20241027) (82) *after install download new database*
news: Dear Testers :) join beta thru this new link https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.einstein.dmr_database_app or thru https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.einstein.dmr_database_app thanx
A new database has been uploaded to Github. Update thru the database Settings Screen.

header: Can someone test the online contact options ?
news: on my device the links dont open can someone confirm this ? on sunmi,ios,macos,web it works not on my redmi
